website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas Samba MC Leather is a revamped version of the 1950s classic Samba. Now coming in a more minimal design, these sneakers retained what is essential and stripped off certain branding accents like the signature Three Stripes.Nonetheless, some details were maintained like the low-top silhouette, gum sole, and leather upper. Overall, these sneakers are made to come in style and keep the feet comfortable all day.
pros: One user particularly loves the tongue’s throwback style
It made the shoe have a muted but stand out design because of the monochromatic color
Several consumers highly adore the slick and minimal style of the Samba MC Leather
A high number of reviewers appreciates how comfortable these sneakers are
One even noted that these are more comfortable than the original Sambas
One tester loves these soccer-inspired sneakers because it permits him to jump on different sports without changing shoes
According to one user, these fill the gap between a casual dressy sneaker and a purposeful indoor shoe
It has a non-traditional leather shoe design that can suit even more formal outfits
One reviewer mentioned that these sneakers provide excellent traction
A significant number of online users expressed appreciation on the colorway selection of the Samba MC Leather
It deviates from the usual trendy athletic shoe designs which sport flashy colors
A few reviewers adored these shoes’ versatility
It can be paired with almost any outfit effortlessly
These sneakers are worth the price, stated by one user
cons: A significant number of online testers note that these sneakers have a narrow design
The tongue of the Adidas Samba MC Leather is long that it causes chafing to several users
The gum sole is less dense than the original Sambas, according to one user

customer_reviews.title: Love the look; but caution; narrow, and uncomfy
customer_reviews.text: initially unhappy; they run small, are SUPER narrow, and they were really, outright, painful for over a week. The footbed is uncomfortable; it's as if they put the arch support on the outside instead of the inside of the foot. After months, they've minimally broken in and now are bearable in terms of comfort. Not the level of comfort I remember from my Samba's as a kid. Might want to order a half-size up
customer_reviews.author: Anand1001

customer_reviews.title: they fit like you would expect if you wear sambas and look ...
customer_reviews.text: If you we hoping for an all black version of traditional sambas, you're out of luck. The whole upper is suede and thinner than normal sambas. The gum sole also seems less dense and more prone to wear. On a positive note, they fit like you would expect if you wear sambas and look great. Just don't expect them to hold up the same.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon A Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Nice sneakers
customer_reviews.text: They look great and are comfortable, but I can already tell they won't last nearly as long as Samba Classics do. Don't even think about actually playing indoor soccer with these either, they're strictly a fashion sneaker. That's what I bought them for, so I'm happy with the purchase overall. Also, I have narrow feet and the size 9 fits me perfectly. People with normal-to-wide feet may end up with a shoe which is the right length but too tight.
customer_reviews.author: TJP

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking. Feels a little flimsy compared to the sambas im used to but will see how they hold up and let you know. Fit is comfortable and as expected. Tongue needs to be trimmed for me. Sticks up too far, although if youre playing soccer it is purposeful! Ive worn sambas forever and like the style of them. Black with gold lettering looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Harting

customer_reviews.title: Loving my sambas
customer_reviews.text: I will never stop loving sambas. I will say that this pair is quite comfy the only thing I don't like about them is that at the heel it can rub ur skin the wrong way if you wear no show ankle socks so pick the right socks people. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Waitman

customer_reviews.title: Tight and sore
customer_reviews.text: Great traction on the gym floor, but too narrow, and no arch support....they're okay for a couple of hours of Pickleball- but that's it. I bought them because they don't have all the flashy color schemes like most silly athletic shoe designs... these LOOK nice - that's all.
customer_reviews.author: Belal B. Alkadimi

customer_reviews.title: ordered a 9 (his usual size) and they fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for a friend. He reports that the shoes fit perfectly... ordered a 9 (his usual size) and they fit like a glove! They also look fantastic and give a nice pop of color to your wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: angelpenn

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are very light and comfortable. I matched the size to other Adidas shoes I own and these sized the same. Very happy with the style and color. Was looking for a non traditional leather shoes to wear with khaki pants and they look wonderful. Very pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: ~Troy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sneakers for everyday using, bought in for my friend and he like it.
customer_reviews.author: MPOne

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes. Very narrow
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes. Very narrow. I had to get insoles just to wear them. But now I live in them.
customer_reviews.author: Gsq

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, color is odd. Almost looks like a lavender/grey in some light conditions.
customer_reviews.author: B. E. H.

customer_reviews.title: Badass.
customer_reviews.text: These are super cool looking, really minimal and sleek. They almost look like Margiela. Totally loved the way they looked right out of the box, and was really surprised by how comfortable they were. I wear these to work and I'm on my feet all day, they're still totally comfortable by the end of the day. $50 well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Evans

customer_reviews.title: awesome and super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes - super comfortable and about as stylish as I'm likely to get. The only thing is that they feel like a quarter size too big, so not sure if I'll jump to the next half-size down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they are great.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I have purchased. they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with these shoes. Lots of complements from strangers, comfortable, cool looking. I've worn adidas Sambas of various types for 20 years now, but this pair is considerably more comfortable than I expected. The material of the insole is terrific. Great purchase, I might get the black ones too.
customer_reviews.author: Nik S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Another great looking pair of Samba's. they arrived sooner than expected as well :)
customer_reviews.author: Brianne Stoddard

customer_reviews.title: 3 but it's small it hurts my toe so perfect size would be 44 for real 43 size
customer_reviews.text: as usually i wear EU size 43 and i ordered 43.3 but it's small it hurts my toe so perfect size would be 44 for real 43 size feet
customer_reviews.author: howlin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap imitation
customer_reviews.text: Last week I ordered two Adidas shoes from Amazon. Unfortunately both of them appear to be cheap imitation of the original.
customer_reviews.author: H. Akan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST SNEAKER!!! These are great for me I am on my feet all day and this is my second pair.
customer_reviews.author: CLASSIC ROCK 64

customer_reviews.title: All Black
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I have the originals, but it is nothing like an all black shoe. I had to go up a 1/2 a sz and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes
customer_reviews.text: Sambas have been my go to for a decade. These bridge the gab between a stylish casual dress shoe and a functional indoor shoe. These fit like a glove and were comfortable from day 1.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Black

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, and they fit better than they look ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, and they fit better than they look as though they would, considering how narrow they seem. They're very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: overall love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: received my box all damage... made me question the product...overall love the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look amazing and seem to be durable so far
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Metzger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe nice looking and comfort, what more could you ask for . Totally awesome. Completely satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Neal L.

customer_reviews.title: Half size up !
customer_reviews.text: really comfortable and stylish , but order at least half size up.
customer_reviews.author: tamaz neparidze

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The style isn't like the original sambas, they're more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: carlos munoz

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable shoes. I would advise that these are not indoor soccer shoes. They look like it, but are not meant for futsol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits like every other pie of Sambas I've had. Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: daniel y.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son for Christmas. He loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Sojourner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome adidas
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these daily for 3 months now. They are comfortable, light and don't hurt my feet at the end of the day. Even with 2+ hours daily of walking in circles trying to catch invisible monsters like a crazy person.
customer_reviews.author: Adams Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Not a classic Samba fit
customer_reviews.text: These don't fit like the classic Sambas, the heel curves in and is too tight for the achilles.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Half a size smaller
customer_reviews.text: Usually 9. 5 and 10 fit but for these shoes I order a 10 but felt like a 9. 5 so it fit fine
customer_reviews.author: Yohan

customer_reviews.title: Hardly resembles a true pair of Sambas.
customer_reviews.text: I just received my delivery took one look at these and requested a refund. The shoes look worn even though the soles look new. There are stains on both shoes, the heel is worn on one side, and the laces are chewed up on one side as well. The quality of the shoe is also lacking in my opinion, it feels very flimsy and cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they don't look as good in person as they do in the picture
customer_reviews.text: my husband loves the black and white version of these shoes. He thought he'd try the all black version. While well made, they don't look as good in person as they do in the picture. We returned.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Bought these to were for work provides great arch support and relieves knee pain from standing all ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to were for work provides great arch support and relieves knee pain from standing all day and is very comfortable. The Tongue is a bit uncomfortable if short socks are worn but longer socks sixes that minor issue.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Blackwood

product_meta.title: adidas Performance Samba Mc Lthr Shoe, Black/Black/Gold Metallic, 7 M Us
